column3: Built successfully on my gitian machine (haven't tested the build yes though): https://bitcoin.jonasschnelli.ch/build/213
Bleh, the boost work-around is really nasty. It breaks my use-case with cloudabi, where fs::path is not actually convertible from/to a string losslessly.
@theuni This can be closed given https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/10616#issuecomment-372027171 ? Otherwise needs rebase
Closing, let me know when it needs to be reopened.
